ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: I also agree...No drop is absolutly the most stupid thing I have ever heard of! I can see the use for certain situations like the newbie food/stein quest and
ygData.messageBody:
I also agree...No drop is absolutly the most stupid thing I have ever heard
of! I can see the use for certain situations like the newbie food/stein
quest and even the PoF armor (I know i would go absolutly insane if i saw a
lvl 3 ranger in full thorny vine). But there are times when its absolutly
insane to make somthing no drop...like the micro servos in steemfront I
uset to be able to get a micro servo along with the treant bow staff and the
dwarven wire (also no drop now...i just destroyed 11 spolls of it cause i
couldnt do anything with it now) to a fletcher along with maby 10pp and they
try the trueshot bow for me. Now i cant do that and i have to buy the bow
from sombody who has gathered all of the components and who can fletch.
Other no drop items puzzle me. The Order of thunder medalion is off of
Drosco who is about lvl 5 in the qeynos aquaducts. Its +5chr 2ac Prety nice
but i no longer have any use for it...why cant i give it away or sell it?

Me: "Selling a Order of thunder Medalion +5chr 2ac"
Buyer: "I could use the added charisma and I dont have time to waste
in the aquaducts looking for drosco...I will take it"
Me: "How is 2pp?"
Buyer: "I have 2pp to spare...Sure!"
Me: <Strugeling> "I cant seem to pry it from my
hands!....GRRRRR...I cant seem to let go. Its as if some
ungodly force wants me to keep this absolutly useless item
with me or destroy it"
Buyer: "Oh well...I will go spend my time camping Drosco...Even
though he was green to me at least 20 levels ago!"

How about gnoll fangs...these used to be dropable...if you didnt want em you
tosed em on the ground or auctioned them away for a few silver each. Now,
even though you dont want them, some force poseses you to hold on to them.
The only way to get rid of them is by crusing them and uterly destroying
them. What was wrong with buying/trading gnoll fangs? It was a good way for
you to raise qeynos faction. All you get is a moonstone worth a few silver
which you could turn in for a BB stout worth a silver or 2 more. Hardly good
money after lvl 5!

One thing that realy anoys me are the quest items that have no details on
them and hence need to be identified but alas they are no drop! The other
day I got 2 LORE NO DROP "Bone Chips" off of 2 dread corpses chacing a low
lvl player. What are they for? maby if i could have them identified i could
figure out!

Trevalien
